name: The Shotgun Adagio
description: This is a game uploaded for Bring Out Your Dead. It is juvenilia - I started it when I was 17 and abandoned it when I was 18. It is very, very bad indeed. (I talk some more about how bad over here.) You are a cool vampire in a cool black leather trenchcoat and you have cyberpunk hair and a bunch of cool friends but also Deep Angst that is Very Profound. You... probably do stuff for reasons?
